name: MTLBufferLayoutDescriptor
desc: An object that configures how a function fetches input data for an attribute.

items.name: var stride: Int
items.desc: The distance, in bytes, between entries in the buffer for the attribute.

items.name: var stepFunction: MTLStepFunction
items.desc: Determines which aspect of command execution triggers data fetches.

items.name: var stepRate: Int
items.desc: The rate at which data is fetched by the step function.

items.name: enum MTLStepFunction
items.desc: The frequency with which a function fetches attribute data.
